name: St. Teresa Margaret of the Sacred Heart

locations.description: Carmelite nun in Florence, known for her devotion to the Sacred Heart and hidden life of prayer

summary: Teresa Margaret of the Sacred Heart was an Italian Carmelite nun who lived a hidden life of intense prayer and devotion to the Sacred Heart. Despite dying at only 23, she was known for her profound mystical experiences and deep love for God. Her spirituality emphasized the indwelling of the Trinity and the practice of charity.
